author: .fjl
content: Hi, it's possible to add more bootstrap nodes

author: .fjl
content: But we are reluctant to do it because in the past, other bootnodes that we had listed disappeared without notice.

author: .fjl
content: It's kind of a hassle to keep checking if those nodes exist

author: .fjl
content: Nowadays, we also use DNS-based bootstrapping

author: .fjl
content: And we are happy to share the responsibility of maintaining DNS node lists with others

author: .fjl
content: You can find more information about this in https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/developers/dns-discovery-setup

author: .fjl
content: If your project is running nodes, you could publish them as a DNS node list and share the `enrtree://` URL with us.

author: .fjl
content: We would then add it as a link in our DNS list.

author: .fjl
content: hehe, just realized I'm replying to a message from many months ago ðŸ™‚
